} }

components.name: ThemeToggleComponent
components.description: Componente de botón de alternancia de tema Cambia entre modo claro y oscuro con transiciones suaves
components.rawdescription:
Componente de botón de alternancia de tema
Cambia entre modo claro y oscuro con transiciones suaves
components.templateData:
<button
  type="button"
  class="p-3 rounded-full bg-white/70 dark:bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-md border border-gray-300 dark:border-white/10 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 transition-all duration-300 hover:bg-white/90 dark:hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-purple-500/30 hover:-translate-y-0.5 hover:shadow-[0_4px_12px_rgba(168,85,247,0.3)] cursor-pointer"
  (click)="toggleTheme()"
  [attr.aria-label]="(isDarkMode | signal)? 'Cambiar a modo claro' : 'Cambiar a modo oscuro'"
>
  @if ((isDarkMode | signal)) {
  <svg
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    fill="none"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
    stroke-width="2"
    stroke="currentColor"
    class="w-5 h-5 transition-transform duration-300 hover:rotate-180 hover:scale-110"
  >
    <path
      stroke-linecap="round"
      stroke-linejoin="round"
      d="M12 3v2.25m6.364.386-1.591 1.591M21 12h-2.25m-.386 6.364-1.591-1.591M12 18.75V21m-4.773-4.227-1.591 1.591M5.25 12H3m4.227-4.773L5.636 5.636M15.75 12a3.75 3.75 0 1 1-7.5 0 3.75 3.75 0 0 1 7.5 0Z"
    />
  </svg>
  } @else {
  <svg
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    fill="none"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
    stroke-width="2"
    stroke="currentColor"
    class="w-5 h-5 transition-transform duration-300 hover:rotate-12 hover:scale-110"
  >
    <path
      stroke-linecap="round"
      stroke-linejoin="round"
      d="M21.752 15.002A9.72 9.72 0 0 1 18 15.75c-5.385 0-9.75-4.365-9.75-9.75 0-1.33.266-2.597.748-3.752A9.753 9.753 0 0 0 3 11.25C3 16.635 7.365 21 12.75 21a9.753 9.753 0 0 0 9.002-5.998Z"
    />
  </svg>
  }
</button>
